thread.title: This is how badly the Spurs want to prevent Steph Curry from shooting a 3
thread.title_full: This is how badly the Spurs want to prevent Steph Curry from shooting a 3

author: Mike Prada
title: This is how badly the Spurs want to prevent Steph Curry from shooting a 3
text:
Protecting the three-point line is more important than protecting the hoop.
You think the Spurs are paying attention to Stephen Curry at the three-point line.
Let’s slow that down again.
They sent THREE players to stop Curry and left Zaza Pachulia all by himself. Welcome to the new NBA.
Amazingly, this happens more than you’d think. I spotlighted this video from a Warriors-Thunder game last year .
And it makes sense. Allowing a 2 is better than allowing a 3.
